files.patch:
@@ -102,0 +102,4 @@
+    // On AIX malloc(0) returns NULL which looks like an out-of-memory condition; so adjust it to malloc(1)
+    #ifdef _AIX
+    body = (jbyte *)malloc(length == 0 ? 1 : length);
+    #else
@@ -103,0 +107,1 @@
+    #endif
@@ -242,0 +247,4 @@
+    // On AIX malloc(0) returns NULL which looks like an out-of-memory condition; so adjust it to malloc(1)
+    #ifdef _AIX
+    body = (jbyte *)malloc(length == 0 ? 1 : length);
+    #else
@@ -243,0 +252,2 @@
+    #endif
+
